headline: Sherwin-Williams (SHW) Earnings Expected to Grow: What to Know Ahead of Next Week's Release
summary: Sherwin-Williams (SHW) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.
